item.title: Simple Code — Effective UI — Month Picker
item.description: Option 1: separate Month and Year dropdowns Separate month and year dropdowns It may be verbose, but you have total control over their placements, label, and format <select> <option>January</option> <option>February</option> <option>March</option> <option>April</option> <option>May</option> <option>June</option> <option>July</option> <option>August</option> <option>September</option> <option>October</option> <option>November</option> <option>December</option> </select> Month <select> <option>2021</option> <option>2022</option> <option>2023</option> </select> Year Option 2: use the browser’s built-in month picker Built-in month picker You have less control over the picker’s appearance, but the code is much cleaner.
